content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-11.5, 69.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 69.5) - operational, working status
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 71.5) - requires regular refueling with coal, status fluctuates between WORKING and NO_FUEL
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, 75.5) - operational, working status with energy: 14916.67
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
The system is operational but the boiler needs regular refueling with coal. Current throughput shows approximately 178 water and 178 steam per 60 seconds.

### Electricity Network
Consists of:
- Small electric poles connecting the steam engine to the mining drills and assembling machine
- Expanded power network with poles at positions (4.5, 77.5), (8.5, 77.5), (12.5, 77.5), (16.5, 77.5), (20.5, 77.5), (24.5, 77.5), (28.5, 77.5), (28.5, 81.5), (33.5, 96.5), and many more
- Additional poles placed at (35.5, 99.5), (28.5, 99.5), (24.5, 99.5), (24.5, 95.5), (24.5, 91.5), (24.5, 87.5), (24.5, 83.5), (24.5, 79.5), (20.5, 79.5), (16.5, 79.5), (12.5, 79.5), (8.5, 79.5), (4.5, 79.5), (0.5, 79.5), and (-0.5, 79.5)
- Further expanded with poles at (35.5, 96.5), (24.5, 96.5), (20.5, 96.5), (16.5, 96.5), (12.5, 96.5), (8.5, 96.5), (4.5, 96.5), (0.5, 96.5), (-0.5, 96.5), (-0.5, 92.5), (-0.5, 88.5), (-0.5, 84.5), and (-0.5, 80.5)
- New poles added at (29.5, 81.5), (0.5, 77.5), and (29.5, 77.5)
- Electricity group with ID 22474 spanning from the steam engine to the production areas
The power network is operational with voltage: 4015655.

### Iron Mining Operation at Position(27.5, 85.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill 1 at position(27.5, 85.5) - operational but warning about blocked drop position
- Electric mining drill 2 at position(30.5, 85.5) - operational but warning about blocked drop position
- Small electric pole at position(29.5, 83.5)
- Both drills are positioned over iron ore resources (approximately 250,000 iron ore each)
- Both drills are working but have warnings about blocked drop positions
Current throughput shows approximately 38-40 iron ore per 60 seconds.

### Iron Smelting Area at Position(28.0, 88.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace 1 at position(28.0, 88.0) - operational, working status with iron ore (94) and iron plates (51) in output
- Stone furnace 2 at position(31.0, 88.0) - operational, working status with iron ore (94)
- Burner inserter at position(31.5, 89.5) - working, transfers items from furnace to wooden chest
- Burner inserter at position(27.5, 90.5) - waiting for source items, has coal fuel (9)
- Wooden chest at position(28.5, 90.5) - empty
- Wooden chest at position(31.5, 90.5) - empty
- Burner inserter at position(29.5
